list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The car approached (the traffic lights) at top speed
The boys ran off at the approach of a policeman.

list_definition.definition: a road, path etc leading to a place

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: All the approaches to the village were blocked by floods.

list_definition.definition: an attempt to obtain or attract a person’s help, interest etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They have made an approach to the government for help
That fellow makes approaches to (= he tries to become friendly with) every woman he meets.
